doc.after: Music as an academic discipline can take a number of different paths including music performance music education training music teachers musicology ethnomusicology music theory and composition Undergraduate music majors generally take courses in all of these areas while graduate students focus on a particular path In the liberal arts tradition music is also used to broaden skills of non musicians by teaching skills such as concentration and listening
